column4: Anyone know when i create an alias ( alias steam="cd /home/rob/TransGaming_Drive/Program\ Files/Valve/Steam/ && cedega Steam.exe &") when i close the terminal and type in the command it doesn't work but if i've used the alias and keep the term open it works :S
